questions.question: Select the last item of arr = [1, 2, 3]
Multiply each element of arr = [1, 2, 3] by 2
Multiply each element of arr = [1, 2, 3] by 2 and update arr
Choose the even elements of arr = [1, 2, 3, 4]
Delete the odd elements of arr = [1, 2, 3, 4]
Add a value for gender to the person hash
A class must have?
questions.info:
A class must have some kind of state that defines the attributes of its instances. 
In the case of a simple rectangle, this could simply be its length and breadth. 
A class must also have behavior. This is achieved by the programmer adding methods to the class that interact with its state.

questions.question: Create a lambda that increments any number passed to it by one.
questions.info: A lambda is just a function without a name

questions.question: Pass a block that increments a number by one to the method "add".
questions.info: One of the most common uses for a lambda involves passing exactly one block to a method

questions.question: A module only has?
questions.info: Modules contain methods that you can include in any number of classes
